means: 读错，念错，对…判断错误( misread的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Misreading our intentions, the enemy held the western end of the island in considerable strength.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于误解了我们的意图, 敌人以巨大的实力防守该岛的西海岸.

sentence.Network_en: The biggest misreading of all is over Russia's own political future.
sentence.Network_cn: 最遭误读的是俄罗斯自身的政治前途.

sentence.Network_en: However , when these theories were cited , some misreading occurred.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是萨义德在借用这些理论的时候存在诸多误用与自相矛盾.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...，包含着“正误”与“反误”；一个是审美主体的创造性误读（misreading）。
mispairing错配misreading错读，错译missens e错义

list.abs: through all the blunders and misread signals ., 通过所有失策与误读的信号.
His tactlessness showed that he had completely misread the situation ., 他不能随机应变 , 这表明他对情势完全误解了.
cultural manifestation 文化诉求cultural misreading 文化误读cultural pluralism; multiculturalism 文化多元化.
The Vice President said your Administration misread the economy ., 副总统说 , 您的政府误读了经济情况.

entry.def: If you misread a situation or someone's behaviour, you do not understand it properly.

example.ex: The government largely misread the mood of the electorate...
example.tran: 政府在很大程度上没有弄清楚全体选民的情绪。

example.ex: Mothers may also misread signals and think the baby is crying because he is hungry.
example.tran: 母亲们也可能误以为宝宝哭是因为肚子饿了。

entry.def: If you misread something that has been written or printed, you look at it and think that it says something that it does not say.

example.ex: His chauffeur misread his route and took a wrong turning.
example.tran: 他的司机看错路线，拐错了方向。

auth_sentence.content: Your misreading appears to have begun with the title.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your misreading appears to have begun with the title.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your misreading appears to have begun with the title.

auth_sentence.content: It was a gross misreading of the market.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a gross misreading of the market.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a gross misreading of the market.

auth_sentence.content: Eugenics relied on a colossal misunderstanding of science and a savage misreading of history.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eugenics relied on a colossal misunderstanding of science and a savage misreading of history.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eugenics relied on a colossal misunderstanding of science and a savage misreading of history.
